string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Oh, you put No Copyright infrigement intended on your video. You must be a legal expert
The moment when you realize it wasnt a fart.
I dont know who you are, but I will look you up on LinkedIn and I will find you.
What if I told you the internet is more than porn and facebook.
Love is in the air? Wrong. Nitrogen, Oxygen and Carbon Dioxide are in the air.
What if the first person who ate the poison berries was just allergic and were missing out on a delicious berry?
I didnt choose the thug life. The thug life chose me.
The look I give my patient when theyre trying to get out of bed
So youre telling me that your govt. can process data from the hundreds of billions of people it spys on but it cant create a functioning website to provide its own citizens with healthcare?
Dude, toasters are like tanning beds for bread.
